locus.template:
Load the 'locus' skill and help the user plan their project.

If they provided a project idea: $ARGUMENTS
Start with Step 1: Vision.

If no idea provided, ask what they want to build.
locus.description: Start or resume a project (Vision → Features → Design → Build)

locus-status.template:
Show the current Locus project status.

Look in projects/ for the most recent project.
Read .locus-state.yaml and display progress visually.
Keep it simple - no file paths or technical jargon.

locus-list.template:
List all Locus projects in the projects/ directory.

For each, show: name, current step, last updated.
Display as a clean list. If none exist, suggest starting one with /locus.
